alert.note: Alert for Meeker (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 28 at 9:25PM CDT until August 29 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL MEEKER AND SOUTHEASTERN STEARNS COUNTIES... At 925 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Watkins, or 16 miles southwest of St. Cloud, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Kimball. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
